column1: @SecPompeo is a partisan hack and refusing to denounce #COVID19 as a hoax will cost American lives. Good for you @tedlieu!
@kcranews Why is no one telling us about #coronavirus transfers to our local hospitals?!? This guy with #COVID19 is on his way to Folsom, potentially putting people going to Folsom Mercy at risk!

This could be the US in 3 weeks:

https://twitter.com/jasonvanschoor/status/1237142891077697538?s=19 …

I wish we had a capable leader during this #coronavirus but we have an inept, corrupt, racist man baby instead.
